H0.text: Which British comedy actor has a refuse tip named after him in New Zealand, after he visited Palmerston, and said that it was a great place to commit suicide. Rowan Atkinson

H1.text: Which British comedy actor has a refuse tip named after him in New Zealand, after he visited Palmerston, and said that it was a great place to commit suicide. Ricky Gervais

H2.text: Which British comedy actor has a refuse tip named after him in New Zealand, after he visited Palmerston, and said that it was a great place to commit suicide. Stephen Fry

H3.text: Which British comedy actor has a refuse tip named after him in New Zealand, after he visited Palmerston, and said that it was a great place to commit suicide. Cleese

A4.text: A municipal rubbish heap 45 metres (148 ft) high that has been named Mt Cleese at the Awapuni landfill just outside Palmerston North after he dubbed the city 'suicide capital of New Zealand' after a stay there in 2005.
